<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> ofpr

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.75

</value></part><part><name>arg</name>=<value> global

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Animations

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Returns the phase of the given animation on the given object. Animation can be scripted ([[animate]], [[animateSource]], [[animateDoor]]) or engine driven. Animation names for an object could be found out with [[animationNames]] command. When animation is rotation, like with "MainTurret" for example, the output is in radians, to convert to degrees use [[deg]] command.

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> object '''animationPhase''' animationName

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> object: [[Object]] - building eg

</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> animationName: [[String]] - name of the animation. This is the class-name of the animation defined in the addon's config.cpp.

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Number]] - range 0 (start point of the animation) to 1 (end point of the animation).
		  
</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>_building [[animate]] ["maindoor",1];
[[sleep]] 1;
_p = _building [[animationPhase]] "maindoor";</code>

returns 1 (if the animation speed is <ext><name>nowiki</name><attr/><inner><=</inner><close></nowiki></close></ext> 2 seconds)

</value></part><part><name>x2</name>=<value> <code>_flagPole [[animationPhase]] "flag";</code>

</value></part><part><name>x3</name>=<value> <code>_tank [[animationPhase]] "MainTurret";</code>

</value></part><part><name>mp</name>=<value> In OFP, on dedicated servers, ''animationPhase'' will always return 0, no matter what the actual phase is.</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[animate]], [[moveTime]], [[setFaceAnimation]], [[animateDoor]], [[doorPhase]], [[animateSource]], [[animationSourcePhase]], [[animationNames]]
</value></part></template>
